content: Stocks Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 07 Mar 2019Keep hearing about penny stocks in investment movies like "wolf of wall street", why are they so easy to make money from, and can you get them in SG?1 answerAnswerBump0

Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 07 Mar 2019Penny stocks are very very risky. Even in wolf of wall streets, its easy to make money for the brokers commission not for the investors. They are usually smaller companies with low trading volume and high volatility.0 comments0
